channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MA

item.title: Report E-2023070071
item.description:
Report E-2023070071

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-24T15:13:04+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-08
  • City: NORTHBOROUGH
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: A. DUIE PYLE INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: While loading a pallet of freight into a trailer the forklift operator did not realize the forkblades from his forklift were protruding from the pallet he was carrying and as a result when he went to put the pallet down the forkblades punctured a box on a pallet already staged in the trailer. As a result the forkblade punctured to enclosed 1 gallon containers that were in the boc consequently contributing to the unintentional release. Spilled material was cleaned with absorbent and placed into a recovery container as was the punctured containers.

item.title: Report X-2023061503
item.description:
Report X-2023061503

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-20T21:09:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-20
  • City: NATICK
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE CONTAINED IN TOTE AT VAN LOAD BELT AND BROUGHT TO QA AND PLACED IN HAZMAT CAGE. DescribePack: 1 OF 3 PLASTIC BOTTLES WAS CRUSHED AND CAP AND SEAL BENEATH POPPED OFF. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: INADEQUATE INTERNAL STRUCTURE TO PROTECT ONLY 3 BOTTLES IN BOX THAT COULD HOLD 4. CAP AND SEAL NOT STRONG.

item.title: Report X-2023061500
item.description:
Report X-2023061500

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-20T21:09:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-19
  • City: NATICK
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE DISCOVERED AFTER UNLOAD AND BROUGHT TO HAZMAT CAGE. DescribePack: NO DAMAGE TO OUTSIDE ONTAINER. 2 OF 4 GLASS BOTTLES WER BROKEN. THERE WER SLOTTED PORTIONS WITH HARD CARD BOARD COVERING ON TOP. BOTTOM PARTITION MADE OF SAME MATERIAL AS TOP COVER. TOP OF BOX STAPLED AND TAPED. BOTTOM OF BOX WAS GLUED AND TAPED. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: EVAPORATED IN HAZ CAGE WITH VENTING.
